text:
Mohammed Mzali (, 23 December 1925 – 23 June 2010) was a Tunisian politician. He served as Prime Minister of Tunisia from 23 April 1980 through 8 July 1986. Mzali was born in Monastir, Tunisia.
He served as a member of the International Olympic Committee from 1965 until his death in 2010.
Mzali died in Paris, France from a long-illness, aged 85.
